action-group.diy-instructions:
IMPORTANT! Once you modify and upload all the files :
Log on to Administration Control Panel #####################################################################
A) Purge the cache :
A.1) Navigate to "GENERAL" Tab. A.2) Next to "Purge the cache" click on "Run now". A.3) in the next screen, click on "Yes".
#####################################################################
B) Purge the templates, Themes and Images Galery from Prosilver and Subsilver2:
B.1) Navigate to "STYLES" Tab. B.2) Under "Style components " click on "Templates". B.3) Under "Actions" click on "Refresh". B.4) in the next screen, click on "Yes" ( Repeat last 2 steps with Themes and Images Galery ).
#####################################################################
